categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Graich was a male Human Captain of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY he was stationed at the Dorn Base on Hoth and relayed to an arriving Imperial hero a message from Khun Tazith. Graich was enthusiastic about the famed Bane Brigade resurfacing to wipe the Republic from Hoth, unaware that it was in fact a ruse by Tazith designed to raise Imperial morale while plummeting the Republic's.
